de.bitbrain.braingdx.event

Class GameEventRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.behavior.BehaviorAdapter
      • de.bitbrain.braingdx.event.GameEventRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior

    public class GameEventRouter
extends BehaviorAdapter
    An event router which manages object collisions and detects events happening in the world. It then publishes events depending on the event configuration.

    There are the following properties on any GameObject which can be treated as an event:

    • sticky - sticky events do not disappear after a trigger and will be triggered after re-entering
    • producer - a custom producer type which overrides the default producer. The default producer is the game object colliding with the event object
